remarks: Our earlier expression for a containing weak universe is in fact the weak universe closure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
wuncval2.f $e |- F = ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> ( ( z u. U. z ) u. U_ x e. z ( { ~P x , U. x } u. ran ( y e. z |-> { x , y } ) ) ) ) , ( A u. 1o ) ) |` _om ) $.
wuncval2.u $e |- U = U. ran F $.
wuncval2 $p |- ( A e. V -> ( wUniCl ` A ) = U ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d x y z $.
